entry.name: dockOrderLeft
entry.label: The order of the docked window in the dock

entry.name: dockOrderTop
entry.label: The order of the docked window in the dock

entry.name: dockOrderRight
entry.label: The order of the docked window in the dock

entry.name: dockOrderBottom
entry.label: The order of the docked window in the dock

entry.name: dockHHeight
entry.label: The default height of a horizontal docked window in percent

entry.name: dockHWide
entry.label: The default width of a horizontal docked window in percent

entry.name: dockHGap
entry.label: The default Gap of a horizontal docked window in pixels

entry.name: dockHEdgeGap
entry.label: The default Vertical Gap of a horizontal docked window in pixels

entry.name: dockHAlignment
entry.label: The default Alignment of a horizontal docked window which can be Center , Left, Right

entry.name: dockHEdgeAlignment
entry.label: The default vertical Alignment of a horizontal docked window which can be Edge Screen, Middle, Center Screen

entry.name: dockVHeight
entry.label: The default height of a vertical docked window in percent

entry.name: dockVWide
entry.label: The default width of a vertical docked window in percent

entry.name: dockVEdgeGap
entry.label: The default horizontal Gap of a vertical docked window in pixels

entry.name: dockVGap
entry.label: The default Gap of a vertical docked window in pixels

entry.name: dockVEdgeAlignment
entry.label: The default horizontal Alignment of a vertical docked window which can be Edge Screen, Middle or Center Screen

entry.name: dockVAlignment
entry.label: The default vertical Alignment of a vertical docked window which can be Center, Top, Bottom

entry.name: dockSurfacesConfig
entry.label: Dock settings change the default parameters for the surface

entry.name: dockWindowClassConfig
entry.label: Dock default settings for WindowClass which with high priority.

entry.name: tileLayoutOrder
entry.label: Tile layout order

entry.name: tileLayoutInitialRotationAngle
entry.label: Tile layout initial rotation angle

entry.name: monocleLayoutOrder
entry.label: Monocle layout order

entry.name: threeColumnLayoutOrder
entry.label: Three Column layout order

entry.name: spiralLayoutOrder
entry.label: Spiral layout order

entry.name: quarterLayoutOrder
entry.label: Quarter layout order

entry.name: quarterLayoutReset
entry.label: Reset Quarter layout after closing a window

entry.name: stackedLayoutOrder
entry.label: Stacked layout order

entry.name: columnsLayoutOrder
entry.label: Columns layout order

entry.name: enableColumnsLayout
entry.label: Enable/disable Columns layout

entry.name: columnsLayoutInitialRotationAngle
entry.label: Columns layout initial rotation angle

entry.name: columnsBalanced
entry.label: Enable/disable creating a new window in the shortest column

entry.name: columnsLayerConf
entry.label: Columns layout default configuration.

entry.name: spreadLayoutOrder
entry.label: Spread layout order

entry.name: floatingLayoutOrder
entry.label: Floating layout order

entry.name: stairLayoutOrder
entry.label: Stair layout order

entry.name: stairReverse
entry.label: Reverse the stair layout's orientation

entry.name: binaryTreeLayoutOrder
entry.label: BTree layout order

entry.name: cascadeLayoutOrder
entry.label: Cascade layout order

entry.name: ignoreActivity
entry.label: Do not apply tiling on some activities(comma-separated list of activity names)

entry.name: ignoreClass
entry.label: Ignore windows with certain classes(comma-separated list)

entry.name: ignoreRole
entry.label: Ignore windows with specific role(comma-separated list)

entry.name: ignoreScreen
entry.label: Do not apply tiling on some screens(comma-separated list of screen names)

entry.name: ignoreVDesktop
entry.label: Do not apply tiling on some virtual desktops(comma-separated list of virtual desktops names)

entry.name: ignoreTitle
entry.label: Ignore windows with certain string in title(comma-separated list)

entry.name: screenDefaultLayout
entry.label: Assigning number of layout to screen(output) by default

entry.name: tileNothing
entry.label: Don't tile any windows by default

entry.name: tilingClass
entry.label: Tile windows with certain classes(comma-separated list)

entry.name: floatingClass
entry.label: Float windows with certain classes(comma-separated list)

entry.name: floatingTitle
entry.label: Float windows with certain string in title(comma-separated list)

entry.name: floatUtility
entry.label: Automatically float utility windows (Dialog, Splash, Utility)

entry.name: layoutPerActivity
entry.label: Use separate layouts per activity.

entry.name: layoutPerDesktop
entry.label: Use separate layouts per desktop.

entry.name: tiledWindowsLayer
entry.label: What layer will have tiled windows

entry.name: floatedWindowsLayer
entry.label: What layer will have floated windows

entry.name: soleWindowWidth
entry.label: The sole window width in percent.

entry.name: soleWindowHeight
entry.label: The sole window height in percent.

entry.name: soleWindowNoBorders
entry.label: Do not draw borders around sole window

entry.name: soleWindowNoGaps
entry.label: Do not draw gaps around sole window

entry.name: monocleMaximize
entry.label: Always maximize windows in Monocle layout

entry.name: monocleMinimizeRest
entry.label: Minimize other tiles than the current one in Monocle layout

entry.name: adjustLayout
entry.label: Adjust layout with mouse

entry.name: adjustLayoutLive
entry.label: Adjust as window is being resized

entry.name: keepTilingOnDrag
entry.label: Always preserve the tiling status of a window upon dragging

entry.name: noTileBorder
entry.label: Remove borders of tiled windows

entry.name: preventMinimize
entry.label: Prevent windows from minimizing

entry.name: preventProtrusion
entry.label: Prevent windows from protruding out of screen

entry.name: notificationDuration
entry.label: Duration of pop-up notifications

entry.name: screenGapLeft
entry.label: Gap between tiles and screen borders (Left)

entry.name: screenGapRight
entry.label: Gap between tiles and screen borders (Right)

entry.name: screenGapTop
entry.label: Gap between tiles and screen borders (Top)

entry.name: screenGapBottom
entry.label: Gap between tiles and screen borders (Bottom)

entry.name: screenGapBetween
entry.label: Gap between tiles in Tile layout

entry.name: gapsOverrideConfig
entry.label: Override default screen gaps

entry.name: floatSkipPagerWindows
entry.label: Make the window float if its property: skipPager=true (HACK)

entry.name: directionalKeyDwm
entry.label: Up, Down, Left, and Right shortcut behaves like dwm

entry.name: directionalKeyFocus
entry.label: Up, Down, Left, and Right shortcut moves focus

entry.name: limitTileWidth
entry.label: Limit the width of tiles

entry.name: limitTileWidthRatio
entry.label: Ratio of maximum tile width to the height of screen

entry.name: newWindowPosition
entry.label: The position every new window in the screen window array

entry.name: logging
entry.label: Enable logging

entry.name: logNewWindows
entry.label: Log new windows

entry.name: logFilteredWindows
entry.label: Log filtered windows

entry.name: logUnmanagedWindows
entry.label: Log unmanaged windows

entry.name: logWorkspaceSignals
entry.label: Log signals from workspace

entry.name: logWorkspaceSignalsSubmodules
entry.label: Specify a comma separated list of numbers workspace signals submodules

entry.name: logWindowSignals
entry.label: Log signals from windows

entry.name: logWindowSignalsSubmodules
entry.label: Specify a comma separated list of numbers window signals submodules

entry.name: logOther
entry.label: Log all other modules

entry.name: logOtherSubmodules
entry.label: Specify a comma separated list of numbers all other submodules

entry.name: logFilter
entry.label: Enable log filters

entry.name: logFilterStr
entry.label: Specify a comma separated list of filters
